Package com.hexaware.model

Class FinancialRecord

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.model.FinancialRecord
public class FinancialRecord extends Object
Represents a financial record for an employee in the system.

      public FinancialRecord()

    • FinancialRecord

      public FinancialRecord(int recordID, int employeeID, Date recordDate, String description, String recordType, double amount)
      Constructs a FinancialRecord object with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      recordID - The ID of the financial record.
      employeeID - The ID of the employee associated with the financial record.
      recordDate - The date of the financial record.
      description - The description or category of the financial record.
      recordType - The type of financial record (income, expense, tax payment, etc.).
      amount - The monetary amount of the financial record.
